# Interactive graph


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<style>
  * { font-family: sans-serif; }
  body { margin: 20px; }
  h1 { text-align: center; }
  #plot { position: relative; }
  .tooltip {
    position: absolute;
    background: #fff;
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 3px;
    pointer-events: none;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #333;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.2s ease;
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>

<h1>Map plot for Regional Centrality Index in Manhattan</h1>

<div id="plot"></div>
<div class="tooltip" id="tooltip"></div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>

</body>
</html>
